role.argrole: entity or activity that is good

example.parse: ( (IP (IP (ADVP (AD 还是)) (IP-SBJ (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (LCP-TMP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (VV 吃) (NP-OBJ (QP (CD 些)) (ADJP (JJ 淀粉类)) (NP (NN 食物))))) (LC 之后)) (ADVP (AD 再)) (DVP (ADVP (AD 少量) (AD 多次)) (DEV 地)) (VP (VV 喝) (NP-OBJ (NN 牛奶))))) (VP (VV 为好))) (PU ，) (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *PRO*)) (VP (ADVP (AD 最好)) (VP (VV 能) (VP (VV 饮用) (NP-OBJ (NN 酸奶)))))) (PU 。)))
example.arg: 吃些淀粉类食物之后再少量多次地喝牛奶
